room_title: Escape room "Word Mania Extreme" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
review: Went with a few friends and our children in the Word Mania Room (kid's version). We were extremely engaged, entertained and challenged throughout our hour of fun. My kids have been begging to go back for more!The second visit I made to the Word Mania room was with a group of friends for a "date night." We set out to complete the advanced version. Our group enjoyed many laughs and an abundance of suspense. Our money and time was well spent.

room_title: Escape room "Word Mania Extreme" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
review: This was so much fun! Our family did the 60-minute Word Mania Extreme room. It was a great family outing. Our kids range in age from 8-15, everyone was able to get involved and were engaged the entire time. Owners were great! They really made the experience work for our group. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Word Mania Extreme" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
review: Our group had a wonderful time working together to solve Word Mania! The room was a good challenge and we shared lots of laughs!
